reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Castle Forbes
reviews.reviewText: This has the most exquisite, rich and consistent blend. Everything is just right. The chemistry does not disrupt the balance of your skin and perfectly cools and replenishes the strength of your skin. Just the perfect silky smooth and best smelling shaving cream. There is no goopy-like soapy feeling like Proraso has or the unbalanced not quite right feel of Castle Forbes but has the same great smell just has a much better cream silk consistency. The Art of Shaving is the real deal. The facial hair grows back way healthier and neat from the nutrient richness of the formula.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great, and a little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this shaving cream. Has a nice light lavender scent and a all you need is a tiny dab for a full lush face-full of shaving cream. Even if you shave every day it should last a long long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more razor burn!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had the worst time with razor burn on my bikini line. I would occasionally get it on my legs too. I know this product caters to men but I use the lavender scent and it works perfectly. I no longer have razor burn. My bikini line looks amazing. The price of the bottle was a little scary. However, it lasts me several months, and I use it to shave everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am very impressed.
reviews.reviewText: took some motivation to switch from Harry's only because it costs more. turns out it is so completely worth it. Excellent! a truly smooth comfortable shave, this is a wonderful product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gives a good shave if properly used.
reviews.reviewText: I generally like Art of Shaving products, even though they tend to be over priced. If you are someone who is using your average drugstore shaving cream than you will think this cream is outrageously priced. There are definitely other creams which are priced lower and do just as good a job as this cream. Specifically, the three T's of the wetshaving world come to mind, those are TOBS (Taylor of Old Bond Street), Trumpers, and Truefitt and Hill. However, this is a cream that you can actually find in a lot of local malls because it is carried by stores like Nordstroms, Dillards, and Macys. With the other creams I mentioned you will most likely have to purchase them online.I think Art of Shaving gets a lot of things right with their shaving creams. First they do a very good job with the smell. I have used this scent, sandalwood and the unscented version. I like the sandalwood scent the best, but the lavender is nice for my sensitive skin. I will tell you this, it is not a very masculine scent. So if you don't want to be smelling lavender for the first few hours of your day, then don't use this product. However if you do like the smell of lavender than Art of Shaving nails the scent, as they do with all their creams. Second, I like that Art of Shaving makes an aftershave balm and pre-shave oil with the same scent. However, if you think the shaving cream is over priced, you will certainly think so with the shave oil and the aftershave balm. In my opinion both those products are only average and I am someone who always uses pre-shave oil and an aftershave balm.So with all the caveats, why do I still think this is a good cream? Well, you will get a good shave with the cream and it will last you a long time, making it worth your money if you follow one rule, always apply it with a badger brush. The cream says that it can be used with or without a brush, but to me there is a marked difference in the quality of the shave if you don't use a badger brush. If you do use one, you will get a nice lather, with a pleasant smell, that will give you a close and comfortable shave and the tub will actually last you a long time, 3 or 4 months with daily shaving. However, you must use with a brush. It takes time to learn how to properly use a brush to create a proper lather for wetshaving but it is something worth learning to get a good shave and on the plus side you will use about a fourth of the amount of product that you would use if you just used your fingers to apply it to your face. Overall, this cream is a big step up from what you will find at your average drugstore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like shaving with teflon
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this product! This is my first time for the lavender and right now I like the scent of the sandalwood I have used before better, but I bet when I get through with this jar, I will love this one too and the "Scent" column will go up to 5 stars. Also the "Travel" rating: the jar it comes in is too big to go traveling with, but I have some small, screw-top containers I have put the AofS in that are PERFECT for travel, twice as good as anything you can buy at a drugstore. It is amazing how little of the shave cream you need to get an unbelievable shave. If you are used to a conventional shave cream and you dip a bit of this wonder on your finger and you wonder if you have enough, you have five times too much. A jar lasts me more than a year, shaving almost every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smell and cushion for your face
reviews.reviewText: Price is getting out of hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a game changer
reviews.reviewText: It does a lot foam. I used less than a corner of a nail and I shave three times in different directions and still have left over. I recommend to use a marble or stone bowl, and hot water. The price maybe is a bit high but I think it will last way more than the can filled with his only know chemicals. The fragrance have my wife going crazy. She loves it and gave me green light to get try other fragrances. The beard will be like 15 old boy face all over again. Definitely is a “RECOMMEND ”
The best shaving cream as of now i have tried. Most recommended.

reviews.reviewerName: Useless and cannot project on celling as shown. Product not yet picked up and no communication also after repeated request

reviews.reviewText: Spedizione e tempistica perfetta, prodotto eccezionale, come sempre.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 22, 2018
reviews.reviewText: I have quite sensitive skin and use this every day with a straight razor. It lathers really well, smells nice, and leaves my skin feeling soft and cool afterwards. Highly recommend this, the only real downside being it took almost 2 weeks to arrive.
I've been using this shaving cream for a few years and I never want to run out of it. It works well, smells fresh and lasts a long time.
